body.bibl: Thekeparampil, Jacob, and Daniel Leigh McConaughy. Jacob of Serugh’s Three Mimre on Simon Peter: 1. On the Question of Our Lord and the Revelation Simon Received from the Father; 2. On Simon Kepha When Our Lord Said “Get Behing Me Satan”; 3. On the Denial of Simon. Awsār Slāwōt’ō 10. Kottayam, India: St. Ephrem Ecumenical Research Institute, 2023.
